solution_line_template: If Beatrix has {beatrix_books} books, Alannah has {beatrix_books} books + {alannah_more_than_beatrix} books = <<{beatrix_books}+{alannah_more_than_beatrix}={alannah_books}>>{alannah_books} books.
Queen has {queen_fraction_more} * {alannah_books} books = <<{queen_fraction_more}*{alannah_books}={queen_additional_books}>>{queen_additional_books} more books than Alannah.
The total number of books Queen has is {alannah_books} books + {queen_additional_books} books = <<{alannah_books}+{queen_additional_books}={queen_total_books}>>{queen_total_books} books.
All three have {queen_total_books} books + {alannah_books} books + {beatrix_books} books = <<{queen_total_books}+{alannah_books}+{beatrix_books}={total_books}>>{total_books} books together
